description: Full-page horizontal scroll container with snap points and wheel-to-horizontal conversion

children.description: Page components to render in horizontal layout

enableWheelHijack.description: Convert vertical mouse wheel to horizontal scroll

enableKeyboardNav.description: Enable arrow key navigation between pages

threshold.description: Minimum wheel delta to trigger page change (pixels)

onPageChange.description: Callback fired when active page changes

default.description: Standard horizontal scroll with snap points and smooth scrolling

childComponent.name: Page
childComponent.description: Wrapper for individual pages within the horizontal scroll

focus.management: Focus returns to page after scroll
focus.indicator: Current page index announced to screen readers

behavior.reductions: Vertical mouse wheel events are converted to horizontal scroll. Each scroll action snaps to the nearest page boundary. Arrow keys navigate between pages. Smooth scrolling uses motion.dur.base (200ms) and motion.ease.emphasis. Respects prefers-reduced-motion by using instant scroll. Focus trap integration: closes menu before scrolling.

integration.menu: Menu closes automatically on page change
integration.video: Video pauses when scrolling away from video page
integration.routing: URL updates to reflect current page (optional)
integration.deepLinking: Supports initial scroll to specific page via URL hash
